sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"吸收"之意。
means: absorb ：普通用词，词义广泛，既可指吸收光、热、液体等具体东西，又可指吸收知识等抽象概念的东西。
suck ：作"吸收"解时，可与absorb换用，但还可有"吮吸"之意。
digest ：侧重在消化道内改变食物的化学结构后被人体吸收。
incorporate ：指一物或多物与它物相融合，形成一整体。

sentence.Network_en: Queensway Quay will incorporate shops, restaurants and other amenities.
sentence.Network_cn: 女王道码头将会融商店、餐馆以及其他生活便利设施为一体。

sentence.Network_en: We had to incorporate the company for tax reasons.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于纳税的原因,我们不得不把那家公司合并了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin incorporat- 'embodied', from the verb incorporare, from in- 'into' + Latin corporare 'form into a body' (from corpus, corpor- 'body')

entry.def: If one thing incorporates another thing, it includes the other thing.

example.ex: The new cars will incorporate a number of major improvements.
example.tran: 新款汽车会有若干重大改进。

entry.def: If someone or something is incorporated into a large group, system, or area, they become a part of it.

example.ex: The agreement would allow the rebels to be incorporated into a new national police force...
example.tran: 协议将允许把叛军收编入一支新的国家警备部队。

example.ex: The party vowed to incorporate environmental considerations into all its policies.
example.tran: 该党宣誓要把环境因素纳入它所有的政策当中。

means.word_mean: 1. make into a whole or make part of a whole;

sentences.sentence: "She incorporated his suggestions into her proposal"

means.word_mean: 2. include or contain; have as a component;

sentences.sentence: "A totally new idea is comprised in this paper"
"The record contains many old songs from the 1930's"

means.word_mean: 4. unite or merge with something already in existence;

sentences.sentence: "incorporate this document with those pertaining to the same case"

means.word_mean: 1. formed or united into a whole

auth_sentence.content: I'm trying to incorporate his passion for living.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm trying to incorporate his passion for living.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm trying to incorporate his passion for living.

auth_sentence.content: He said Generation III reactors incorporate the latest technology.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said Generation III reactors incorporate the latest technology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said Generation III reactors incorporate the latest technology.

auth_sentence.content: Then gradually add the butter and incorporate fully.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then gradually add the butter and incorporate fully.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then gradually add the butter and incorporate fully.

stems_affixes.word_buile: corpor身体,团体+al……的→身体的
corpor身体,团体+ate……的→adj.共同的,团体的
corpor身体,团体+real真的→真的身体→有形的
in无+corporeal[adj.有形的;物质的]→adj.无形体的,非物质的
corpor身体,团体+ation表名词→n.公司,团体
in进入+corpor团体+ate表动词→v.合并

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: in向内,成为,进入,使……+born出生的→adj.天生的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cent唱歌+ive……的→把精神唱进去→激励
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cis=cise切+ive……的→切入→入木三分
in向内,成为,进入,使……+door门→门内的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+spir呼吸+ed的→有呼吸的→有生命的
in不,无,非+visible看得见的→adj.看不见的, 无形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 效率低的, 效率差的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+efficient有效的→adj.效率低的, 效率差的
in不,无,非+accurate正确的→adj.错误的, 不准确的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无行动的, 不活动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+active积极的→adj.无行动的, 不活动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不充分的, 不适当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+adequate足够的→adj.不充分的, 不适当的
in不,无,非+calculable可计算的→adj.不可计算的
in不,无,非+capable有能力的→adj.无能力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不完全的, 不完善的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+complete完全的,圆满的→adj.不完全的, 不完善的
in不,无,非+constant稳定的→adj.多变的,无常的
in不,无,非+convenient便利的→adj.不便的, 有困难的
in不,无,非+corrigible可改正的→adj.积习难改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不明确的;不定的,模糊的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+definite明确的→adj.不明确的;不定的,模糊的
in不,无,非+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已"→冷漠的
in不,无,非+dign高贵+ant……的→[因发脾气]不高贵的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可避免的, 必然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+evitable可避免的→adj.不可避免的, 必然的
in不,无,非+human人道的→adj.不人道的
in不,无,非+imit模仿+able可以……的→不能模仿的
in不,无,非+justice公正→adj.不公正
in不,无,非+noc毒害+ous……的→无害的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+significant有意义的→adj.无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
in不,无,非+glor光荣+ious……的→不光荣的
in不,无,非+temperate自制的→adj.放纵的
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
indoor[adj.户内的]+s→adv.在户内
in向内,成为,进入,使……+curs跑+ion表名词→跑入→侵犯
in不,无,非+accuracy准确→n.错误
in不,无,非+difference不同→不不同→没什么不同,没什么了不起→冷漠,无足轻重
indifference[n. 不关心,冷漠,无足轻重]→n.漠不关心, 不在乎
in不,无,非+stability稳定→n.不稳定[性]
in不,无,非+significance意义→n.无意义
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
in向内,成为,进入,使……+put放→n.&v.输入
in向内,成为,进入,使……+augur=augury预兆,开始+ate表动词→进入开始→就职;参考:augury预兆
in向内,成为,进入,使……+corpor团体+ate表动词→v.合并
in向内,成为,进入,使……+flame火焰→v.使燃烧;激怒
in向内,成为,进入,使……+hale气→进气,吸气
in向内,成为,进入,使……+vigor活力+ate表动词→v.鼓舞,激励

Sentence.sentence: For example, universities could incorporate IDPs into their graduate curricula to help students discuss, plan, prepare for, and achieve their long-term career goals.
Governments of rapidly developing countries incorporate waste minimisation thinking into the transport infrastructure and storage facilities currently being planned, engineered and built

means.word_mean: 包含, 加上, 吸收

sentences.en: The shopping centre also incorporates a library and a bank.
sentences.cn: 商业中心还包括一家银行和一家图书馆。

sentences.en: We had to incorporate the company for tax reasons.
sentences.cn: 由于纳税的原因, 我们不得不把那家公司合并了。

sentences.en: When Smith's business became large, he incorporated it.
sentences.cn: 当史密斯的业务扩大之后, 他把它组成了公司。

sentences.en: His book incorporates his military thinking.
sentences.cn: 他的书体现了他的军事思想。
这家工厂与别家合并了。

jushi.chinese: 他的这本书里收录了其早年写的文章。
